projectsList.name: POS, Payroll & Attendance System (with Fingerprint Integration)
projectsList.description: A cross-platform POS system with integrated payroll, fingerprint-based attendance, and multi-branch support. Built with Laravel API, Quasar frontend, and a Java-based fingerprint scanner desktop app.

projectsList.name: Quick Checker App
projectsList.description: An AI-powered test checker that grades using an answer key or applies AI reasoning to assess answers. It provides editable results, allowing users to review and adjust AI-generated scores for accuracy.

projectsList.name: Hitz App
projectsList.description: Mobile-first ride-sharing application that utilizes Google Maps API for real-time location tracking and route optimization.

projectsList.name: Test Maker
projectsList.description: Web-based test maker application that allows users to create, manage, and share tests. It features a user-friendly interface and supports various question types.

projectsList.name: Tollfast App (Competition Project)
projectsList.description: Mobile application for toll collection and management. It features real-time location & transaction tracking, and reporting.

projectsList.name: Trip Booking System
projectsList.description: A web-based trip booking system tailored for island tours, featuring real-time availability, booking management, and user-friendly interface.

projectsList.name: my-vhost
projectsList.description: A CLI tool to manage virtual hosts in your machine at ease.

projectsList.name: HttpFlux
projectsList.description: Opinionated and reusable Maven-based Java HTTP client package supporting REST APIs and multipart uploads with automatic header injection.

projectsList.name: ZK9500 Scanner
projectsList.description: Java-based application that runs as a background service, capturing fingerprint data via ZK9500 Scanner and communicating with local applications via WebSockets.

intro: Turning ideas into sleek, scalable applications using Laravel, Vue, and Quasar — crafted for real-world impact and built to grow with users.
aboutMe:
I've spent the past 3 years building full-stack applications with Laravel, Vue, and Quasar — focusing on clean code, maintainability, and scalability.

Beyond coding, I lead architecture planning and manage CI/CD pipelines for smooth, reliable deployments.

I'm passionate about creating user-friendly, efficient applications that solve real-world problems.
